comment._content: Jerome Davis Greene (1874-1959), American banker, his wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jerome_Davis_Greene

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: As secretary of the Rockefeller Foundation, he testified regarding the bona fides of the Foundation before the Walsh Commission (Commission on Industrial Relations) in a hearing on February 2, 1915 at the Metropolitan Building in New York. (Bain has a series of photos, likely taken in that building on that day of Commission witnesses.) query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F00E12F83E5C13738...
